Package me.aecsocket.calibre.item.system

Interface CalibreSystem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AcceptsCalibrePlugin, CalibreIdentifiable, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.registry.Identifiable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AmmoStorageSystem, ComponentProviderSystem, GunProjectileProviderSystem, ProjectileProviderSystem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAmmoStorageSystem, AmmoContainerSystem, BaseSystem, BulletSystem, ComponentStorageSystem, FireModeSystem, GunSystem, ItemSystem, MeleeSystem, SightSystem, SlotDisplaySystem
    public interface CalibreSystem
extends CalibreIdentifiable
    A system which interacts with a CalibreComponent, such as listening for item events.
